name: Chimchar

evolution.description: Chimchar can evolve into Monferno at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 6 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Chimp Pokémon. It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Iron Fist
abilities.description: When attacking with a punch-based move (Mega Punch, Dynamic Punch, Ice/Fire/Thunder Punch, etc.), this Pokémon may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
